snippet: With his 44 points, 10 assists and 8 rebounds in Game 2 against the Heat, point guard Rajon Rondo asserted his place in Boston’s plans for seasons to come.
abstract: Howard Beck On Pro Basketball column on Boston Celtics point guard Rajon Rondo, who has played an integral role in leading the team to Eastern Conference finals against Miami Heat; notes that in 53 minutes played in Game 2, Rondo scored 44 points, made 10 assists and grabbed 8 rebounds, asserting his place in Celtics plans for seasons to come.
lead_paragraph: With his 44 points, 10 assists and 8 rebounds in Game 2 against the Heat, point guard Rajon Rondo asserted his place in Boston’s plans for seasons to come.

headline.seo: N.B.A. Playoffs — Rajon Rondo Provides Vision of Celtics’ Future
headline.main: Rondo Provides Vision of the Celtics’ Future
headline.print_headline: Rondo Provides Vision Of the Celtics’ Future
